About Me

I am Sherri Mitchell -- Developer, Problem, Solver, and Dreamer. I see code as a way to bring abstract possibilities to life. I get excited about expressing my ideas through coding. I have a pretty vivid imagination, and look at things in kind of a different way. I like to look at things and think what could be and how I could make something happen. I started out my career as a technical writer and moved into BA work. So, I am all about the details. I am really sensitive to the needs of the customer, and as I look for a technical solution I always keep it in the context of what the customer is trying to accomplish.

I am available for work, and I would love to help you bring your coding ideas to life..
